text: Cingolani is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Andrea Cingolani (born 1990), Italian male artistic gymnast * Angela Maria Guidi Cingolani (1896–1991), Italian politician * Daniel Cingolani (born 1961), Argentine racing driver * Giovanni Cingolani (1859-1932), Italian painter and art-restorer * Mario Cingolani (1883–1971), Italian Christian Democrat politician * Roberto Cingolani (born 1961), Italian scientist Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Cingolani
